title: Rescue the Tieflings
content:
ns a green-hued hole that leads to a level below, giving you an answer about the tadpoles and weird flesh noises inside the tower. When escorting them on the boat, the quest will be completed for both Rescue the Tieflings and Rescue Wulbren.
